name: Card Battle Spirit Link
description: Get ready for a new kind of digital multiplayer card game. No shuffled decks, no random card packs. In Card Battle Spirit Link, strategy is the key!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (32-bit or 64-bit) Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 640/Radeon HD 5770 Storage: 800 MB available space
